text: Clarrie Morelli (6 October 1906 – 19 May 1997) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Clarrie Morelli's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1906 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Clarrie Morelli
